articles.description: In a regulatory filing, Exide Industries said it made the investment by way of subscription in the equity share capital of Exide Energy Solutions Ltd (EESL) on a rights basis.
articles.content: Battery maker Exide Industries Ltd on Thursday said it has invested over Rs 100 crore in its wholly-owned arm Exide Energy Solutions Ltd, which is into manufacturing of advanced chemistry battery cel… [+793 chars]

articles.author: Nishant Kumar
articles.title: Cochin Shipyard share price turns multibagger in one year, but Kotak downgrades the stock to sell; here's why | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Cochin Shipyard share price hit an all-time high of  ₹1,258. The stock surged 212 per cent in the last one year. In the current calendar year, the stock has jumped 135 per cent.
articles.content: Cochin Shipyard share price surged almost 10 per cent in morning trade on Friday to hit their fresh all-time high of 1,258 on BSE. The stock opened at 1,195 against the previous close of 1,146.15 and… [+2937 chars]

articles.author: Prashant Nair
articles.title: Dixon Technologies is very close to signing a global client: Exclusive - CNBCTV18
articles.description: CFO Saurabh Gupta told CNBC-TV18 that the potential new client is one of the top three global players for laptops and tablets. However, he did not disclose the name.
